"There is a problem with the phone's WebView software, which is used to display message text."
Organize your messages for less clutter. Presets for social network and shopping messages. Define your own too.
See messages from all accounts and folders at once. Exclude some folders from this view if you wish.
Get your new messages almost instantly. Can be enabled for folders other than the Inbox.
Compose messages faster by reusing common text snippets. Yes, with formatting and images.
Enjoy the app completely free for 14 days. After this please consider purchasing a subscription.
